name: project
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: Project
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
spec:
  description: $2

name: service
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  description: $3

name: pagerduty alertmethod
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: AlertMethod
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  description: $3
  pagerduty:
    integrationKey: "123456789"
    sendResolution:
      message: Alert is now resolved

  description: $3

    to:

name: webhook alertmethod
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: AlertMethod
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  description: $3
  webhook:
    headers:
    - isSecret: true
      name: Authorization
      value: very-secret
    - isSecret: false
      name: X-User-Data
      value: "{\"data\":\"is here\"}"
    template: "{\n  \"message\": \"Your SLO $slo_name needs attention!\",\n  \"timestamp\": \"$timestamp\",\n  \"severity\": \"$severity\",\n  \"slo\": \"$slo_name\",\n  \"project\": \"$project_name\",\n  \"organization\": \"$organization\",\n  \"alert_policy\": \"$alert_policy_name\",\n  \"alerting_conditions\": $alert_policy_conditions[],\n  \"service\": \"$service_name\",\n  \"labels\": {\n    \"slo\": \"$slo_labels_text\",\n    \"service\": \"$service_labels_text\",\n    \"alert_policy\": \"$alert_policy_labels_text\"\n  }\n}"
    url: https://123.execute-api.eu-central-1.amazonaws.com/default/putReq2S3

name: prometheus slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: prometheus
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        prometheus:
          promql: sum(http_request_duration_seconds_bucket{handler="/api/v1/slos",le="2.5"})
      incremental: true
      total:
        prometheus:
          promql: sum(http_request_duration_seconds_count{handler="/api/v1/slos"})
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: datadog slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: datadog
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        datadog:
          query: sum:trace.http.request.hits.by_http_status{http.status_class:2xx}.as_count()
      incremental: true
      total:
        datadog:
          query: sum:trace.http.request.hits.by_http_status{*}.as_count()
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: newrelic slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:

    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: new-relic
      project: default
  objectives:

      incremental: true
      total:
        newRelic:
          nrql: SELECT count(*) FROM Transaction TIMESERIES
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: splunkobservability slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: splunk-observability
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        splunkObservability:
          program: data('demo.trans.count', filter=filter('api_server'), rollup='rate').stddev().publish()
      incremental: true
      total:
        splunkObservability:
          program: data('demo.trans.count', filter=filter('api_server'), rollup='rate').mean().publish()
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: dynatrace slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: dynatrace
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        dynatrace:
          metricSelector: builtin:synthetic.http.request.statusCode:filter(and(or(eq("Status code",SC_2xx)))):splitBy():sort(value(auto,descending)):limit(20)
      incremental: true
      total:
        dynatrace:
          metricSelector: builtin:synthetic.http.request.statusCode:splitBy():sort(value(auto,descending)):limit(20)
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: bigquery slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: big-query
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        bigQuery:
          location: US
          projectId: api-server-256112
          query: SELECT http_code AS n9value, created AS n9date FROM `api-server-256112.metrics.http_response` WHERE http_code = 200 AND created BETWEEN DATETIME(@n9date_from) AND DATETIME(@n9date_to)
      incremental: true
      total:
        bigQuery:
          location: US
          projectId: api-server-256112
          query: SELECT http_code AS n9value, created AS n9date FROM `api-server-256112.metrics.http_response` WHERE created BETWEEN DATETIME(@n9date_from) AND DATETIME(@n9date_to)
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: opentsdb slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:

  objectives:

      good:
        opentsdb:
          query: start={{.BeginTime}}&end={{.EndTime}}&ms=true&m=none:{{.Resolution}}-count-zero:http.code{code=2xx}
      incremental: true
      total:
        opentsdb:
          query: start={{.BeginTime}}&end={{.EndTime}}&ms=true&m=none:{{.Resolution}}-count-zero:http.code{type=http.status_code}
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true

    value: 1.0
  service: api-server

  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: grafanaloki slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:

        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3

    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: grafana-loki
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        grafanaLoki:
          logql: count(count_over_time(({component="api-server"} | json | line_format "{{.log}}" | json | http_status_code >= 200 and http_status_code < 300)[1m]))
      incremental: true
      total:
        grafanaLoki:
          logql: count(count_over_time(({component="api-server"} | json | line_format "{{.log}}" | json | http_status_code > 0)[1m]))
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: redshift slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: redshift
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        redshift:
          clusterId: prod-cluster
          databaseName: db
          query: SELECT value as n9value, timestamp as n9date FROM http_status_codes WHERE value = '200' AND timestamp BETWEEN :n9date_from AND :n9date_to
          region: eu-central-1
      incremental: true
      total:
        redshift:
          clusterId: prod-cluster
          databaseName: db
          query: SELECT value as n9value, timestamp as n9date FROM http_status_codes WHERE timestamp BETWEEN :n9date_from AND :n9date_to
          region: eu-central-1
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: influxdb slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: influx-d-b
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        influxdb:
          query: "from(bucket: \"integrations\")\n|> range(start: time(v: params.n9time_start), stop: time(v: params.n9time_stop))\n|> aggregateWindow(every: 15s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)\n|> filter(fn: (r) => r[\"_measurement\"] == \"internal_write\")\n|> filter(fn: (r) => r[\"_field\"] == \"write_time_ns\")"
      incremental: true
      total:
        influxdb:
          query: "from(bucket: \"integrations\")\n|> range(start: time(v: params.n9time_start), stop: time(v: params.n9time_stop))\n|> aggregateWindow(every: 15s, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)\n|> filter(fn: (r) => r[\"_measurement\"] == \"internal_write\")\n|> filter(fn: (r) => r[\"_field\"] == \"write_time_ns\")"
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: googlecloudmonitoring slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: google-cloud-monitoring
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        gcm:
          projectId: my-project-id
          query: "fetch api-server\n| metric 'serviceruntime.googleapis.com/api/request_count'\n| filter\n    (resource.service == 'monitoring.googleapis.com')\n    && (metric.response_code == '200')\n| align rate(1m)\n| every 1m\n| group_by [resource.service],\n    [value_request_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.request_count)]"
      incremental: true
      total:
        gcm:
          projectId: my-project-id
          query: "fetch api-server\n| metric 'serviceruntime.googleapis.com/api/request_count'\n| filter\n    (resource.service == 'monitoring.googleapis.com')\n| align rate(1m)\n| every 1m\n| group_by [resource.service],\n    [value_request_count_aggregate: aggregate(value.request_count)]"
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: generic slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: generic
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        generic:
          query: "SINCE N9FROM UNTIL N9TO FROM a1: entities(aws:postgresql:123) FETCH a1.metrics(\"infra:database.requests.good\", \"aws-cloudwatch\"){timestamp, value} LIMITS metrics.granularityDuration(PT1M)"
      incremental: true
      total:
        generic:
          query: "SINCE N9FROM UNTIL N9TO FROM a1: entities(aws:postgresql:123) FETCH a1.metrics(\"infra:database.requests.total\", \"aws-cloudwatch\"){timestamp, value} LIMITS metrics.granularityDuration(PT1M)"
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: azureprometheus slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: azure-prometheus
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      good:
        azurePrometheus:
          promql: sum(api_server_requests_total{code="2xx"})
      incremental: true
      total:
        azurePrometheus:
          promql: sum(api_server_requests_total{})
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: honeycomb slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: honeycomb
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      goodTotal:
        honeycomb:
          attribute: dc.sli.some-service-availability
      incremental: true
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

name: splunk slo
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: SLO
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertPolicies:
  - fast-burn-5x-for-last-10m
  anomalyConfig:
    noData:
      alertMethods:
      - name: slack-notification
        project: default
  attachments:
  - displayName: Nobl9 Documentation
    url: https://docs.nobl9.com
  budgetingMethod: Occurrences
  description: $3
  indicator:
    metricSource:
      kind: Agent
      name: splunk
      project: default
  objectives:
  - countMetrics:
      goodTotal:
        splunk:
          query: "| mstats avg(\"spl.intr.resource_usage.IOWait.data.avg_cpu_pct\") as n9good WHERE index=\"_metrics\" span=15s\n| join type=left _time [\n| mstats avg(\"spl.intr.resource_usage.IOWait.data.max_cpus_pct\") as n9total WHERE index=\"_metrics\" span=15s\n]\n| rename _time as n9time\n| fields n9time n9good n9total"
      incremental: true
    displayName: Good response (200)
    name: ok
    primary: true
    target: 0.95
    value: 1.0
  service: api-server
  timeWindows:
  - count: 1.0
    isRolling: true
    unit: Hour

    unit: Minute

  releaseChannel: beta

name: fast burn alertpolicy
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: AlertPolicy
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertMethods:
  - metadata:
      name: pagerduty
      project: default
  conditions:
  - alertingWindow: 5m
    measurement: averageBurnRate
    op: gte
    value: 20.0
  coolDown: 5m
  description: $3
  severity: High

name: slow burn alertpolicy
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: AlertPolicy
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertMethods:
  - metadata:
      name: slack
      project: default
  conditions:
  - alertingWindow: 48h
    measurement: averageBurnRate
    op: gte
    value: 1.0
  - alertingWindow: 15m
    measurement: averageBurnRate
    op: gte
    value: 2.0
  coolDown: 5m
  description: $3
  severity: Medium

name: budget almost exhausted alertpolicy
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: AlertPolicy
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertMethods:
  - metadata:
      name: slack
      project: default
  conditions:
  - measurement: burnedBudget
    op: gte
    value: 0.8
  coolDown: 5m
  description: $3
  severity: Medium

name: fast exhaustion alertpolicy
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: AlertPolicy
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertMethods:
  - metadata:
      name: slack
      project: default
  conditions:
  - alertingWindow: 10m
    measurement: timeToBurnBudget
    op: lt
    value: 72h
  - lastsFor: 0m
    measurement: burnedBudget
    op: lt
    value: 1.0
  coolDown: 5m
  description: $3
  severity: Medium

name: slow exhaustion alertpolicy
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: AlertPolicy
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertMethods:
  - metadata:
      name: email
      project: default
  conditions:
  - alertingWindow: 48h
    measurement: timeToBurnBudget
    op: lt
    value: 480h
  - alertingWindow: 15m
    measurement: timeToBurnBudget
    op: lt
    value: 480h
  - lastsFor: 0m
    measurement: burnedBudget
    op: lt
    value: 1.0
  coolDown: 5m
  description: $3
  severity: Low

name: budget drop alertpolicy
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: AlertPolicy
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
  project: $2
spec:
  alertMethods:
  - metadata:
      name: pagerduty
      project: default
  conditions:
  - alertingWindow: 15m
    measurement: budgetDrop
    op: gte
    value: 0.1
  coolDown: 5m
  description: $3
  severity: High

  project: $2

    project: default
  description: $3
  period:
    endTime: 2024-05-01T14:00:00Z
    startTime: 2024-05-01T12:00:00Z

name: budgetadjustment
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: BudgetAdjustment
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
spec:
  description: $2
  duration: 1h
  filters:
    slos:
    - name: api-server-latency
      project: default
    - name: api-server-uptime
      project: default
    - name: proxy-throughput
      project: proxy
  firstEventStart: 2024-01-01T12:00:00Z
  rrule: FREQ=MONTHLY;INTERVAL=1;BYDAY=1TU

name: shr report
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: Report
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
spec:
  filters:
    projects:
    - project-1
    - project-2
  shared: true
  systemHealthReview:
    columns:
    - displayName: Column 1
      labels:
        key1:
        - value1
        key2:
        - value2
        - value3
    rowGroupBy: project
    thresholds:
      greenGt: 0.95
      redLte: 0.8
      showNoData: false
    timeFrame:
      snapshot:
        dateTime: 2024-07-01T10:00:00Z
        point: past
        rrule: FREQ=WEEKLY
      timeZone: Europe/Warsaw

name: slo history report
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: Report
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
spec:
  filters:
    projects:
    - project-1
    - project-2
    services:
    - name: service-1
      project: project-1
    - name: service-2
      project: project-1
    slos:
    - name: slo-1
      project: project-1
    - name: slo-2
      project: project-1
  shared: true
  sloHistory:
    timeFrame:
      rolling:
        count: 2.0
        unit: Week
      timeZone: Europe/Warsaw

name: ebs report
snippet:
apiVersion: n9/v1alpha
kind: Report
metadata:
  displayName: $1
  name: $1
spec:
  errorBudgetStatus: {}
  filters:
    projects:
    - project-1
    - project-2
  shared: true
